About:

Bulletgrounds is a World War 2 themed multiplayer arcade shooter that features vehicles, large maps, destruction and build elements.

  • Featuring:

  • Totally realistically unrealistic weapons from WW2!

  • Even more unrealistic vehicles! Use tanks! Fly with planes! Fly with tanks! Or don't.
    - You're a big boy, you do what you want.

  • Huge outdoor levels. Feel free to ignore objects and just drive into the sunset.
    - Your team probably won't miss you anyway.

  • Destruction. Oh boy, smack those buildings, bunkers and walls down!

  • Buildmode: Oh boy, erect those buildings, bunkers and walls!

  • One gamemode that every game other game has done before.
